body:
During weekend, one of our kubemark runs failed with the following error:

```
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/load.go:187 scaling rc load-small-rc-3541 for the first time Expected error: <*errors.errorString | 0xc8637efb20>: { s: "error while scaling RC load-small-rc-3541 to 3 replicas: the server has received too many requests and has asked us to try again later (get replicationControllers load-small-rc-3541)", } error while scaling RC load-small-rc-3541 to 3 replicas: the server has received too many requests and has asked us to try again later (get replicationControllers load-small-rc-3541) not to have occurred
```

http://kubekins.dls.corp.google.com:8080/view/Scalability/job/kubernetes-kubemark-gce-scale/1196/

This is super strange, because we are retrying  429 errors 10 times in client library.

So I looked into the logs, and what I see is:

```
I0603 20:32:02.537682    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (9.779µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd6    4) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:48896]
I0603 20:32:02.555134    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (11.266µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd    64) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:49194]
I0603 20:32:02.563122    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (10.84µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd6    4) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:48708]
I0603 20:32:02.575100    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (11.374µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd    64) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:49213]
I0603 20:32:02.586701    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (12.889µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd    64) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:49231]
I0603 20:32:02.591956    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (8.88µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd64    ) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:49229]
I0603 20:32:02.593688    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (9.82µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd64    ) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:49247]
I0603 20:32:02.597754    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (12.893µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd    64) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:49251]
I0603 20:32:02.607054    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (11.129µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd    64) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:49242]
I0603 20:32:02.610551    3507 handlers.go:135] GET /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-load-30-nodepods-6-gd2g7/replicationcontrollers/load-small-rc-3541: (8.466µs) 429 [[e2e.test/v1.3.0 (linux/amd6    4) kubernetes/81c5cfc] 104.197.236.78:49264]
```

So we are retrying those requests one by one without and "retry-after".

title: "Retry-After" in client doesn't work
